titles: By the King. A proclamation of His Majesties grace, favour, and pardon, to the inhabitants of His county of Sussex.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
notes: "Given at Our court at Reading, this seaventh day of November, in the eighteenth yeare of Our reigne."
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Place and date of imprint from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Pardons --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
